body.title: Regex substitution
body.elms:
```bash
rename 's/hello/world/' *.txt
```

Rename `hello.txt` to `world.txt` and so on in `*.txt`.

body.title: Options
body.elms:
| Option | Description               |
| ---    | ---                       |
| `-n`   | Simulation                |
| `-l`   | Symlink instead of rename |
| `-i`   | Interactive               |
